description:
Marie faces off against the culprit that took over the king`s body to drive the kingdom towards war. Meanwhile, Lloyd finds the courage to go against Marie`s own wishes to go and assist her.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Suppose the Protagonist of a Novel Led the Story to a Grand Finale?
Tatoeba Shousetsu no Shujinkou ga Monogatari o Daidan`en ni Michibiita You na Asa
たとえば小説の主人公が物語を大団円に導いたような朝
